title_override: Phase 1 — Canonical API Parity Baseline (Foundations) — 12%
Phase 1 — Route-by-route API parity audit with examples (success + error schemas) and identified diffs resolved.
Phase 1 — Permissions: Enforce canonical RBAC across finance, staff, operations (e.g., Sales Manager/Admin).
Phase 1 — Response shapes: Paginated lists {count,next,previous,results}; standardized error payloads.
Phase 1 — JSON Schema: Dev-only validator recognizes canonical aliases; schemas exist for all touched resources.

Phase 4 — Field Service Management Frontend Completion — 10%
Phase 4 — SchedulePage: FullCalendar with drag-and-drop; route optimization hook; ETA markers.
Phase 4 — PaperworkTemplateManager: Template creation with variables and conditional logic.
Phase 4 — CustomerPortal: Time slot selection; appointment request; confirmation emails (mock in dev).
Phase 4 — AppointmentRequestQueue: Manager approval workflow.
Phase 4 — DigitalSignaturePad: Signature capture/persistence; print/export.
Phase 5 — Advanced Analytics Parity & Docs — 8%
Phase 5 — Verify endpoints: /api/analytics/predict/, /api/analytics/clv/, /api/analytics/forecast/, /api/analytics-snapshots/.
Phase 5 — Frontend: Predictions, CLV, Forecast, Snapshots; charts; error/loading states.
Phase 5 — Reports: Date-range filters and export affordances documented.
Phase 6 — Test Coverage Lift (Spec Validation ≥60%) — 12%
Phase 6 — Coverage expansion: Contacts, Deals, Invoicing, Work Orders, Warehouse, Accounting summary.
Phase 6 — a11y tests (cypress-axe) for critical paths; regression tests for auth flows.
Phase 6 — CI coverage surfaced (Codecov) with thresholds enforced.
Phase 7 — Internationalization & Localization — 6%
Phase 7 — Backend/Frontend i18n framework wiring; extraction of user-visible strings; locale switching.
Phase 7 — Date/number/currency localization; timezone awareness in backend and UI; CSV/exports localized.
Phase 7 — Language packs (at least 2 canonical locales) with translation completeness metric.
Phase 8 — Security, Compliance & Privacy — 8%
Phase 8 — Threat model and STRIDE review across modules; secure defaults; CSRF/CORS checks.
Phase 8 — Secrets management; audit logging for sensitive actions; PII classification and masking.
Phase 8 — Vulnerability scanning in CI (SAST/Dependency); role/permission audits and tests; optional SSO readiness.
Phase 9 — Performance & Scalability — 6%
Phase 9 — Backend: N+1 query audits; DB indices; caching strategies (per endpoint where beneficial); pagination defaults.
Phase 9 — Frontend: Bundle analysis; code splitting; lazy loading; memoization; virtualization for large lists.
Phase 9 — Load/perf tests (API + UI) with target SLAs; Lighthouse CI integration for key pages.
Phase 10 — Observability & SRE Readiness — 5%
Phase 10 — Structured logging, metrics, and tracing for core flows; correlation IDs across services.
Phase 10 — Dashboards and alerts for error rates, latency, inventory low-stock, overdue invoices, and SLA breaches.
Phase 10 — Runbooks and SLOs for critical services.
Phase 11 — Integrations & Data Migration — 7%
Phase 11 — Email/SMS providers; optional payment gateway; map/route provider configuration.
Phase 11 — Data migrations for deprecations and canonicalization; dual-write/read compatibility windows; backfills.
Phase 11 — Import/export utilities with schema validation; idempotency and resumability.
Phase 12 — Documentation, UAT & Release Hardening — 8%
Phase 12 — Complete API and UI documentation; story-driven examples; JSON Schemas published (dev-only validator remains gated by DEBUG).
Phase 12 — UAT cycles with representative users; bug triage and fixes.
Phase 12 — Release notes; deprecation notices; feature flags cleanup and defaults finalized.
